bug.summary: Duplicate labels on the same text, highlights more than the selected text
bug.description:
Describe the bug Duplicate labels on the same text, highlights more than the selected text To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Create a "Named Entity Recognition" project Add a task Select a label and highlight a text Select another label and highlight the same text Press submit button For one of the labels the highlight will appear from beginning of line till the end of selected block
Expected behavior Submitting two labels to one block of text should highlight selected text only.
Before clicking submit/update button <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13531332/79114668-dc4bce80-7d51-11ea-87c0-efa4e756121c.png></denchmark-link>
After clicking submit/update button <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13531332/79114724-fdacba80-7d51-11ea-836c-5bf110413239.png></denchmark-link>
Environment:
OS: macOS, ubuntu Browser: chrome, firefox Labelstudio Version: 0.5.0

comments.comment: Not in the latest version. Thank you!
